title: When are melees (that aren't hypermobile and/or CC bots) going to be allowed to enjoy league again?
body:
Serious question.

Because current league isn't fun.

replies.body: {{champion:122}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:23}} ?

Darius is practically troll pick in Masters+ and even high diamond. He's a cheese pick who doesn't do much.

Garen isn't good and I'm not explaining.

Nasus can't teamfight.

Tryndamere is too feast for famine.

> Darius is practically troll pick in Masters+

Are you masters+? LUL just saying

> [{quoted}](name=PePsiLemoNN,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9iNBciZ0,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2017-09-23T16:28:19.786+0000)
>
> Are you masters+? LUL just saying

I wonder where people could get a first-hand view of what it's like in Masters+

https://www.twitch.tv/imaqtpie

Hmm

https://www.twitch.tv/iwilldominate

I dunno

https://www.twitch.tv/gosu

It's impossible to know what it's like there

https://www.twitch.tv/c9sneaky

If only there were a way to witness it

https://www.twitch.tv/jensen

Such a shame

https://www.twitch.tv/tsm_dyrus

Too bad it's so secret

https://www.twitch.tv/faker

Point being: If you are not playing on that level yourself, you can still enjoy those champions.
I am spamming Urgot right now and he is considered weak.

Do I care?
No, I am winning fairly often with him, since he works in the environment I am playing in.
You are only winning because people have no clue how his kit works and how to deal with him, or when are his spikes and such. Is similar to {{champion:83}} all up to gold is a free pass

I'm Diamond and I think Yorick and Urgot are decent. It's more so the player than the champion, but there is a pretty big skill disparity between diamond and master and I do feel in general the Juggernaut class is probably the weakest.
You forgot to mention how sexy urgod is.
I mean that goes without saying {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
Get that sticker out of here you know Ezreal fucking ganked Urgod's rightful spot on the First Star squad.
May I ask who is the one above dyrus picture
the only reason darius is remotely viable in plat+ is that people tilt out of the world and int just for the sake of it.
Ahri is also troll pick in high elo.
Stop lying just reread the response I made tailored just for u

Read the comment I sent you.

source of her winrate: http://na.op.gg/champion/ahri/statistics/mid
Ahri winrate above dia : 51.14%, according to your source. I'm not sure what point you are trying to prove XD

Riot has mentioned specifically that Garen has an absurdly high win rate in low ELO.

Not every champion can be viable at every level.

With 5 bans they could actually just idk ummm BAN HIM. 

so what if they have to perma ban different champions than high MMR does?
{{champion:41}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:80}} ? They all fit the description and are definitely good champions even in high elo.

Gangplank is fucking garbage right now.

Rumble is an anti-bruiser.

Trundle suck because Bramble Vest.

Pantheon is like 54% winrate for 6 months and Riot officially stated they are fine with it.

So... Gp is not meta right now but still does what he has always done.

Rumble is seeing play for worlds, is played at high elo and we are seeing bruisers in the meta... he also fits the description in the thread. How does he not fit the description of the original post?

Trundle has seen a ban at worlds. If he was garbage no pro would even consider him. He is a good tank counter even with bramble vest, especially for teamfights.

So... what is wrong with pantheon again? Sure he might be too good, but how again is he not a "melees (that aren't hypermobile and/or CC bots)".

I am arguing that these all fit the description of the thread to try to stop some of this echo champer effects of people feeling so sorry for themselves that they have gone next level stupid. This is akin to arguing that aatrox is op because he killed you once before becomming useless.
gp is the opposite of a good champion in high elo.
Gp is just in a bad meta and when it changes again, he will become good again. I assume you mean the rest still fit and the thread is wrong?

thing is is these non hypermobile carries become meta their kit and number on them have to be absurd to play in high elo to the point where they are the most broken and dominant champion in league both soloque and pro play.

>Garen isn't good and im not explaining 

But he is atm. The buff to his passive and W made him extremely strong. Just take full armor pen runes, BC, and an armor pen item and you're good to go. Max Q > W > E.
https://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/garen/kr/diamond

op.gg has him right below 50% but even then, it's an extremely small sample size so it's not as reliable as I would like. I would even say Pantheon isn't as good as everybody says despite his winrate however that can be more easily outlined by who he is picked against. 

If we were to just go purely by the %win rate then why is Fiora have the highest pick rate despite having the same wins as Garen?
Because higher pick rates lower winrates.

Play {{champion:102}}  or {{champion:59}} .

Mobile but not hyper mobile and still able to impact games if played well^^
j4 is pretty mobile. What do you consider as mobile?

I wrote mobile but not hyper mobile, his mana costs gate him from jumping around like a madman whenever he wants.

{{champion:64}} {{champion:164}} with enough cdr or Yasuo with minions is what i would consider hyper mobile.

Oh and Ahri with ulti.

Ahri only has ulti to be mobile on a LONG cd. Even with enough cdr, she won't ever have it up like every 10 sec. However, you consider Ahri hyper mobile. 

Ahri also has mana cost that gates her from jumping around whenever she wants. You are very inconsistent with what you consider mobile or not. 

I do think lee Sin should be hyper mobile, Cali is also hyper mobile given the range on her dash.

I did write "Ahri with ulti" meaning that when she has ulti she is considered hyper mobile, otherwise not such much. 

Akali is similar to Ahri with her charges though so i approve of this notion, when she has ulti stacked then she is mobile.

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9iNBciZ0,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2017-09-23T17:10:33.629+0000)
>
> I wrote mobile but not hyper mobile, his mana costs gate him from jumping around like a madman whenever he wants.
> 
> {{champion:64}} {{champion:164}} with enough cdr or Yasuo with minions is what i would consider hyper mobile.
> 
> Oh and Ahri with ulti.

Ahri's Ulti is not a hyper mobile , when you use it , you used your ultimate , I would call it  hyper mobile if it had the same system as Akali's ultimate.

Her ulti is limited hyper mobility^^


Try to argue that {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I like that all of your arguments was just, semantics. Hyper mobility is in reference to being mobile with 2-3 abilities being a dash of some sort or some movement buff. I.E Ahri Q Or soraka passive. I wouldn't call ahri hyper mobile until maybe lv 11 when her ult is on a lower cd

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9iNBciZ0,comment-id=00050000000000010000,timestamp=2017-09-24T11:08:41.198+0000)
>
> Her ulti is limited hyper mobility^^
> 
> 
> Try to argue that {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

The word limited actually ruined the hyper part , lmao

Not really, as i didn't specify how it was limited^^

But to put it this way, from the time when she starts using her ulti to the end she is extremely mobile and slippery.

I think that's an apt enough of her ability to move around with ulti up.


So the limit is just the charges, but with some CDR She actually needs less time to fully charge her ultimate compared to akali all the way until lvl 16.

Then the difference between full charges is a few seconds.

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9iNBciZ0,comment-id=0005000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-24T12:07:31.802+0000)
>
> Not really, as i didn't specify how it was limited^^
> 
> But to put it this way, from the time when she starts using her ulti to the end she is extremely mobile and slippery.
> 
> I think that's an apt enough of her ability to move around with ulti up.
> 
> 
> So the limit is just the charges, but with some CDR She actually needs less time to fully charge her ultimate compared to akali all the way until lvl 16.
> 
> Then the difference between full charges is a few seconds.

Well no matter how good her mobility is , when Blitz grabs her in a teamfight , she is dead ;-;
I recommend dodging, her ulti is quite good for that ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9iNBciZ0,comment-id=000500000000000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-24T13:19:46.285+0000)
>
> I recommend dodging, her ulti is quite good for that ^^

Exactly xD you can't dodge if blitz grabbed you from the jungle and he has 2 or 3 teammates with him , because you have no idea whats going on

You shouldn't walk around in places where you have no vision, especially not with the enemy team missing.

All the supports and tanks will report you for being a bad carry if you do that a few times :<

> [{quoted}](name=Thefrostyviking,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=9iNBciZ0,comment-id=00050000000000010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-09-24T14:31:56.008+0000)
>
> You shouldn't walk around in places where you have no vision, especially not with the enemy team missing.
> 
> All the supports and tanks will report you for being a bad carry if you do that a few times :<

dude you don't get it , I meant when I'm under the tower , and they grab me from the jungle
ain't fun when Fiora's **basic ability** [Q] make her faster than Yi's **ultimate ability** [R]
Let's not pretend Yi's ult is only a movespeed buff.
Long duration ms buffs should be able to run down dashes in the long run.
If fiora does not proc vitals and does not hit anything with her q then yi easily runs her down.

dont worry

mobility doesnt help vs the rammus pressing e either hehe
my favorite thing playing rammus was always when i would taunt at the same time that they flashed away so they would just walk back
Some people just want to watch the world burn
